title: International group praises green revival
summary: A high-level international advisory body applauded China's efforts to improve the environment and suggested a 15-year strategy against pollution in a draft recommendation report on Monday.

title: Russia’s Top Investigator Orders Rescue of Climber in Kyrgyzstan
summary: Natalia Nagovitsyna has been stranded at an altitude of around 7,000 meters for two weeks after breaking her leg while descending Victory Peak on Aug. 12.

title: Russia to Quit Europe’s Anti-Torture Convention
summary: The rights group Crew Against Torture warned the withdrawal could worsen conditions in Russian prisons, where reports of torture are already common.

title: Fire at Rostov Oil Refinery Extinguished Nearly a Week After Ukrainian Drone Attack
summary: Firefighters battled the blaze for days, using so much water that nearby communities faced shortages until supplies were restored on Monday.

title: Peacock Chosen as Symbol of 12th National Games
summary: (KPL) The Organizing Committee of the 12th National Games has officially adopted the design, logo, mascot, and motto for the upcoming “Vientiane Games 2025.” The committee announced that the lucky animal, the peacock, will serve as the symbol of the event.
